data/ph-top/2021/10/micro-saas.json: All you need to build your own SaaS at one place. Covers everything right from starting it from scratch to selling it. Resources and inspirations included.
data/ph-top/2021/10/crewdle.json: The first carbon-neutral video communication platform worldwide Crewdle offers a serverless digital ecosystem that is secure and sustainable, thanks to peer-to-peer technology. The perfect solution to help save the planet, one conversation at a time.
data/ph-top/2021/10/intrro.json: Intrro is productizing the ability to learn who are the top performers in your company’s network—so you can hire more from recommendations.
